question: Who has been  appointed as Indiaâ€™s representative in the council of International Civil Aviation Organisation (ICAO)?
explanation: Shefali Juneja,  a 1992 batch officer of Indian Revenue Service (Income Tax cadre), has been  appointed to the post of Representative of India in the council of International Civil Aviation Organisation (ICAO) in Montreal, Canada for a period of 3 years.  She will replace senior IAS officer Alok Shekhar.
